a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths from pneumonia in elderly people by risk factor, World, 1990 to
Shown is the number of deaths of people 70 years and older from pneumonia and other lower respiratory diseases by risk
factor that was estimated to be responsible for these deaths.
Note: Risk factors can interact and overlap for a given cause of death; therefore the sum of deaths
attributed to risk factors will exceed the total number of deaths from pneumonia.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
